root.name: Men Of War: Red Tide
root.description: CampaignThe player will join up with the Soviet Marines, known as the black jackets to their allies, and the black death to their opponents. The real life events portrayed in the game are based off of writings by Alexander Zorich, and take place around the Black Sea. The campaign will consist of 23 missions and the player will encounter new factions such as the Italians and, Romanians. The game will continue the series tradition of often brutal realism and level of difficulty.System RequirementsMinimumProcessor: Intel Pentium IV at 2.6GHz / Athlon 3000Video Card: 128MB – Nvidia GeForce 6200 / ATI Radeon 9600Memory: 1 GBHard Drive: 5 GBOperating System: Microsoft Windows XP SP1 / Windows Vista / Windows 7Sound Card: DirectX 9.0b compatible sound cardDirect X: 9.0cMultiplayer: 256 kbps broadband connection.RecommendedProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.33GHz / Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200Video Card: 256 MB – Nvidia GeForce FX 8600GT / ATI Radeon HD2600 XTMemory: 2 GBHard Disk: 5 GBOperating System: Microsoft Windows XP SP1 / Windows Vista / Windows 7Sound Card: DirectX 9.0b compatible sound cardDirect X: 9.0cMultiplayer: 256 kbps broadband connection.
